subject: Perjury
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
lead_paragraph: The jury heard taped conversations of Steve Hoskins, a government witness, who says he spoke with Barry Bonds and his former trainer about steroids.
snippet: The jury heard taped conversations of Steve Hoskins, a government witness, who says he spoke with Barry Bonds and his former trainer about steroids.
